TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/BOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In Visual Basic 6.0 die `BOFAction` Eigenschaft wurde verwendet, um zu bestimmen, welche Aktion der `ADODC` ausgeführt werden, wenn die `BOF` Eigenschaft ist "true".In Visual Basic 6.0, the `BOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `BOF` property is true. Diese Konstanten unterstützen Code, der von Visual Basic 6.0 auf weiterhin ausgeführt, ohne zusätzliche Änderung durchgeführt wurde.These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > Funktionen und Objekte im -Namespace werden in den Tools zum Upgrade von Visual Basic 6.0 auf Visual Basic bereitgestellt.Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In den meisten Fällen duplizieren diese Funktionen und Objekte Funktionen, die in anderen Namespaces Sie finden die [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Diese sind notwendig, nur wenn das Visual Basic 6.0-Codemodell sich maßgeblich von unterscheidet die [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Implementierung.They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/BOFActionEnum adStayBOF = int32(1)

summary.span: Moving past the start of a triggers the event on the first record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (BOF) record.

span.span: Moving past the start of a triggers the event on the first record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (BOF) record.

summary.span: At this point, the **Move Previous** button on the is disabled.

span.span: At this point, the **Move Previous** button on the is disabled.
